him and satisfied himself that there was nobody else in the room, addressed Pierre. 
"I have come to you with a message and an offer, Count," he said without sitting down. "A person of very high standing in our Brother- hood has made application for you to be re- ceived into our Order before the usual term and has proposed to me to be your sponsor. I consider it a sacred duty to fulfill that person's wishes. Do you wish to enter the Brotherhood of Freemasons under my sponsorship?"
